TopicTitle: This is kerbal space program (must watch!)

Articles.Content: I have been working for the past week on this video and believe I have created a fantastic video. Take a look i'm sure you wont regret it!
It's a nice video but the scene where the B9 airplane nukes the KSC really clashes with the rest of it...
Very nicely done. Yeah, that plane on a bombing run doesn't really fit, but aerobraking at Duna was cool
Thanks for the input guys. I included that part just to show off the aircraft side of KSP. I guess i could have done that part better

Thanks for the input guys. I included that part just to show off the aircraft side of KSP. I guess i could have done that part better

Yeah, but the entire video has a 'grand exploration' vibe going on, and the bombing (and, in a lesser way, the silly Jeb-on-a-SRB scene) detract from that...

I would have put the SRB one at the beginning of the video, maybe adding a vintage black and white filter over it, to make it look like the (to modern eyes) silly first attempts at flight like this:
Amazing, but as the other guys said, that plane bombing KSC just kills the mood. :/

Why did you nuke the KSC? If you wanted to show the plane part of it show a SSTO taking off or something that fits with the uplifting, exploratory music.

It's an amazing video that shows what KSP is about, I just don't like the nuking and the jeb riding the srb.

Edited June 19, 2013 by Nutt007
I thought it would be like: "This is KSP, This is KSP" to the tune of "This is Haloween"

*slow applause*

That.... was.... beautiful.... (Minus blowing up KSC:P)

Seriously, that was probably better than some of Squad's videos!

I thought it would be like: "This is KSP, This is KSP" to the tune of "This is Haloween"

Haha that would be funny

*slow applause*

That.... was.... beautiful.... (Minus blowing up KSC:P)

Seriously, that was probably better than some of Squad's videos!

Thanks, when I make a new video ill try to keep out violence haha
i liked it! bombing and all!
You just earned a sub, this is amazing, The Bombing KSC part was cool in my opinion but I love the KSP weapon mods
Very nice video. A good showcase for a bunch of mods.
Thanks for all the input guys

Very well done!

I would love to see it with a bit fewer "mod" parts. The fact is that my game doesn't look much like this. And the average new player wouldn't know about mods at first. So seeing a bunch of parts in the video that aren't actually in the game is a bit wrong. My opinion only, though.

Composition was exceptional. I loved the music. The camera angles were spot on. Very well done, indeed.

What mod has those extensible antenna things in the first satellite?

Nice vid, I just don't really like cinematic's personally.
OMG AWESOME VID DUDE what mods did you use for it
The mods used were Remotetech, KW Rocketry, B9 Aerospace, Anvil, Home/Bobcat, JARFR, and some others
Amazing! I especially loved the duna arrival. And it's also the first time i appreciate this music in a while (for once it fits really well).

The mods used were Remotetech, KW Rocketry, B9 Aerospace, Anvil, Home/Bobcat, JARFR, and some others

what mod where the 2 rly neat antennae on the first satellite from?????

Edited June 22, 2013 by crasher925

what mod where the 2 rly neat antennae on the first satellite from?????

It is from the Remotetech mod.

It is from the Remotetech mod.

Exactly.....I love those ones since they look awesome and they have active tracking
I just posted a new this is kerbal space program video
Video is very nice with very few mistakes in it. Well done.
